prompt: Please define this '{prompt}' in hindi(at least 300 words):
label: Explain in Hindi

prompt:
Explain {prompt} only through Examples: Instructions: In your response, please provide verifiable and factual information only, based on existing knowledge and understanding. Share details in no less than 300 words and try to use bullet points in HTML. Use

tags to separate information bytes into paragraphs. Example Structure:

  • Example 1: Context of Example 1.
  • Example 2: Context of Example 2.
  • Example 3: Context of Example 3.
label: Give me examples

prompt:
In no less than 200 words explain this {prompt} using Socratic questioning method teach me using questions and answers. INSTRUCTION: '''

Question No. 1: [Give me the question]

Answer: [Give me the the answer.(use

    and
  • list) ]

    ''' Please give a response in html like format Result:
label: Socratic Questioning

tags(write everything in html format)

prompt:

        and
      • list)]

prompt:
What is {prompt}. Tell me about the '{prompt}' using neccessary details like a 15 year old would be able to understand. Keep the language simple and easy to understand; and step by step. Follow given structure INSTRUCTION: '''

      and

''' Result:

prompt:

create(

)
